title: Short Ghost and Horror Collection 010
creator: various
description: LibriVox recording of Short Ghost and Horror Story Collection Vol. 010, by various authors A collection of twenty stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the stench of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. For more free audio books (in over 25 languages) or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: Horror; Ghosts; Librivox;
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
